channel.title: How to add your forums/website to google's search engine
channel.description:
[b]Purpose: adding forums/websites to the internet's biggest search engine (Google) Difficulty: 1/10 Assumed Knowledge: type and read Server Base: Not Needed Classes Modified: None[/b] go there --> [url=http://www.google.com/addurl/]http://www.google.com/addurl/[/url] if that doesnt work go to [url=http://www.google.com/search?q=add+my+site+url+to+google&sourceid=navclient-ff&ie=UTF-8&rlz=1B2GGFB_enGB229GB230]http://www.google.com/search?q=add+my+site+url+to+google&sourceid=navclient-ff&ie=UTF-8&rlz=1B2GGFB_enGB229GB230[/url] then click the first one "Add your URL to Google"
We add and update new sites to our index each time we crawl the web, and we invite you to submit your URL here. We do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear. Please enter your full URL, including the http:// prefix. For example: http://www.google.com/. You may also add comments or keywords that describe the content of your page. These are used only for our information and do not affect how your page is indexed or used by Google. Please note: Only the top-level page from a host is necessary; you do not need to submit each individual page. Our crawler, Googlebot, will be able to find the rest. Google updates its index on a regular basis, so updated or outdated link submissions are not necessary. Dead links will 'fade out' of our index on our next crawl when we update our entire index. URL:!!!!!! it may say...like its a path to a file what you do is for e.g http://s11.invisionfree.com/your websitename/index.php <--take off index.php Comments:then here you can put like One Of Morparscapes growing servers something like that Optional : To help us distinguish between sites submitted by individuals and those automatically entered by software robots, please type the squiggly letters shown here into the box below.
you should see all this text like this >>>> but d.w it looks better on the page!
Google Information for Webmasters Home About Google Advertising Programs Business Solutions Webmaster Info Submit Your Site Find on this site: Thank you Your site URL has been successfully added to our list of URLs to crawl. Please note that we do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear. You may also be interested in Google webmaster tools, which shows you Google's view of your site, helps you diagnose problems, and lets you share information with us to help improve your site's visibility in our search results Want to do more? Reach more prospects Earn more from your website Showcase your products for free Google AdWords advertising allows you to create your own targeted ads. With cost-per-click pricing you decide how much to spend and you only pay when people click on your ad. Start reaching more prospects with Google AdWords. Google AdSense delivers Google ads that are relevant to the content on your pages. Earn advertising revenue with minimal effort and no additional cost. Earn money from your website with Google AdSense. Froogle is Google's shopping search engine. Learn more about Froogle, and how you can take advantage of free product listings. Attract online shoppers with Froogle. ©2007 Google - Home - About Google - We're Hiring - Site Map
!! Please note that we do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear.!! thanks i hope this makes all server websites that step better :D plz post feedback! and plz dont leech or i will delete this!!!! Galaxy

item.title: How to add your forums/website to google's search engine
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

If your website is easier to find then the quicker the googlebots will pick it up I.E. Have alot of outgoing and ingoing links, ask people to link exchange and try linking to sites with a higher google page rank

Read full topic

item.title: How to add your forums/website to google's search engine
item.dc:creator: @Braille Braille
item.description:
@Braille wrote:

Have a decent website tbh. If you have a good enough website that’s most of the work done since google works on ‘word of mouth’ so to speak, the decency of links back to you and content should do most of the work.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add your forums/website to google's search engine
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Top tip: Using a google service, such as sitemap, analytics, or adwords/adsense, tends to you get indexed faster.

item.title: How to add your forums/website to google's search engine
item.dc:creator: @GalaxyScape GalaxyScape
item.description:
@GalaxyScape wrote:

[b]Purpose: adding forums/websites to the internet’s biggest search engine (Google)

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: type and read

Server Base: Not Needed

Classes Modified: None[/b]

go there --> http://www.google.com/addurl/ if that doesnt work go to http://www.google.com/search?q=add+my+site+url+to+google&sourceid=navclient-ff&ie=UTF-8&rlz=1B2GGFB_enGB229GB230
then click the first one “Add your URL to Google”

We add and update new sites to our index each time we crawl the web, and we invite you to submit your URL here. We do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear.

Please enter your full URL, including the http:// prefix. For example: http://www.google.com/. You may also add comments or keywords that describe the content of your page. These are used only for our information and do not affect how your page is indexed or used by Google.

Please note: Only the top-level page from a host is necessary; you do not need to submit each individual page. Our crawler, Googlebot, will be able to find the rest. Google updates its index on a regular basis, so updated or outdated link submissions are not necessary. Dead links will ‘fade out’ of our index on our next crawl when we update our entire index.
URL:!!!<your url goes here!>!!! it may say…like its a path to a file what you do is for e.g http://s11.invisionfree.com/your websitename/index.php <–take off index.php
Comments:then here you can put like One Of Morparscapes growing servers something like that
Optional : To help us distinguish between sites submitted by individuals and those automatically entered by software robots, please type the squiggly letters shown here into the box below.

<then enter the code then click “add url”>

you should see all this text like this >>>> but d.w it looks better on the page!

Google Information for Webmasters

Home

Your site URL has been successfully added to our list of URLs to crawl. Please note that we do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear.

You may also be interested in Google webmaster tools, which shows you Google’s view of your site, helps you diagnose problems, and lets you share information with us to help improve your site’s visibility in our search results
Want to do more?

Google AdWords advertising allows you to create your own targeted ads. With cost-per-click pricing you decide how much to spend and you only pay when people click on your ad.

Start reaching more prospects with Google AdWords.

Google AdSense delivers Google ads that are relevant to the content on your pages. Earn advertising revenue with minimal effort and no additional cost.

Earn money from your website with Google AdSense.

Froogle is Google’s shopping search engine. Learn more about Froogle, and how you can take advantage of free product listings.

Attract online shoppers with Froogle.

©2007 Google - Home - About Google - We’re Hiring - Site Map

!! Please note that we do not add all submitted URLs to our index, and we cannot make any predictions or guarantees about when or if they will appear.!!
